description.value:
Allows user to load a single dose of a drug into a skin-mounted port. As a Half Action can make a +20 Willpower Test to activate it, automatically administering the drug. If failed, the injector malfunctions and a +0 Tech-Use Test is neccisary to fix it. If implanted multiple times, each implant gives a new port that supplies a single drug dose (doesn't need to be same drug).

Requirements

After use, can be refilled at a later date.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
